title: WHY DO I SUCK 50 TIMES WORSE ALL OF A SUDDEN.
body:
I was killing it and carrying last week. NEK FUCKING MINNIT I'M 2-8 IN MY LAST 10 RANKED GAMES this week YYYYYYY

BOIS DE TILT IS STILL HERE WTF FUCK ME

replies.body:
it isnt tilt. You are versing better players and you were always garbage. A lot of noob vayne players have the same mindset as you. "I used to be a really good vayne player but i just lost it." in reality they were trash and thought they were good tumbling in and going HAM. Then they verse players who have actually learnt to play against Vayne. Git Rikt


trashlordnubkid
not sure if srs or trolle but I actually do think you're right... like... people actually dodge charms now lmao they never did that in bronze.

> [{quoted}](name=TSM BjergWannabe,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=NoPkx8hu,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2015-05-25T12:55:52.826+0000)
>
> not sure if srs or trolle but I actually do think you're right... like... people actually dodge charms now lmao they never did that in bronze.

That is why you don't just shoot it into their face, ahri has good zoning for a reason
oh... i cri evritim pls :'(

You probably hit a rapid matchmaking jump, it happens if you go on winning sprees regularly and it usually is a shock to your system.
Just play bots if you hit a tilt and get some strategy in your laning phase, so who it works for and who it can shut down ect ect.

Also, play some chess
how would chess help?

> [{quoted}](name=Arclight Vayne,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=NoPkx8hu,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-05-26T04:22:30.464+0000)
>
> how would chess help?

If you play you would understand, It's all about positioning
I do play chess and it is about positioning and predicting what your enemy is going to do next. Likewise with league but both completely unrelated. Playing chess will not make you better at league.
lmao yeah dude wot
I 'm a one trick pony so I usually do good at my champion.

I'm KIND of the same. I play ALOT of Ahri. like ALOT. And I carried myself from b3-s4 with her no problems. I used to sit on something like a 3.6 kda and an 80% win rate now im like at 50 something percent and 2.8 kd or some shit like that. idk man, I'm either getting too used and comfortable on her to play adaptively or my opponents are getting better or im just getting shitter coz i dont play as much.
125 isn't a lot, its nothing.
Well I don't really play all that often anymore.. I don't think.
What's that got to do with my comment lol.
lmao thats why i dont have that many ahri games? coz i dont play a lot anymore?

> I play ALOT of Ahri
> i dont have that many ahri games

My first comment had nothing to do with your second comment, think before you comment.
How does it have nothing to do with it... You made a statement and gave an explanation to that statement...

Are you really that dense? You said you play a lot of Ahri and i said 125 games isn't a lot, this has nothing to do with if you still play her or not.

Total games =/= still play her or not

I never mentioned anything about me still playing Ahri or not dude, I said I don't play League a lot anymore.

I said I don't play a lot of League anymore. Hence why I only have 125 games on Ahri.

Semi main Ahri + Play more League = More total Ahri games.

Holy shit you are that dense, i literally quoted you and you still argue the point despite me having already proved everything, I never not once talked about whether you still play Ahri or League in general, my original comment was your total games of 125 is not "a lot" as you said it was, it has absolutely nothing to do with if you still play League or not.

You know what, neither of us is ever gonna get our point across to the other over the internet. 

I have not played a lot of Ahri games. Done.

Your point was irrelevant to what i was talking about.

No you haven't, done.
usually do good at your champion yet request an ap QSS for champions like vayne who can condemn you for being bad. Garbage
{{item:3157}} That's as close as we get
